author: jorton
msg: * include/http_log.h: Remove piped_log structure definition here;
* server/log.c: Move piped_log structure definition here; replace
ap_piped_log_read_fd, with direct reference to structure fields.

author: arkurth
msg: Removed NCSU as the organization name in Windows XP's sysprep.inf.
Corrected the mass storage device driver paths in Windows XP's sysprep.inf. They had been pointing to C:\Drivers instead of C:\Sysprep\Drivers.

author: arkurth
msg: Fixed a bug in configure_networking.vbs where it wasn't correctly identifying the public and private adapter names for VMWare images.
